cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 95 miles ENE of Daytona Beach, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northwest parallel to the northeast Florida coast, then forecast to turn north and north-northeast skirting the Georgia and Carolina coasts
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast of South Carolina or southeastern North Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from north of Ponte Vedra Beach FL to Savannah River GA; additional watches north of Surf City NC to VA border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Volusia/Brevard County FL line to Ponte Vedra Beach FL and from north of Savannah River GA to Surf City NC; Storm Surge Warning Sebastian Inlet FL to Surf City NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coastline from east-central Florida through the Georgia and Carolina coasts
weather_observation.wind: Only a very small (â‰¤6%) chance of brief tropical-storm-force gusts; otherwise breezy conditions possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Gulf coast near Port Manatee; surge warnings confined to Atlantic side.
weather_observation.rainfall: Significant rainfall is not anticipated at the port; heaviest totals remain on the Atlantic side.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated Gulf rip-current risk possible, but no major port-disruptive hazards forecast.
